headline: Why Citi Remains Bullish on Micron Technology, Inc. (MU)
summary: Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) is among the stocks with the best earnings growth for the next 5 years. On January 15, Citi lifted the price target on Micron Technology, Inc. (NASDAQ:MU) to $385 from $330 and maintained a Buy rating, while removing the stock from its US Focus List. According to an analyst note, the […]

headline: Bank stocks to buy after earnings
summary: The fourth quarter was a big one for all of the major banks. Crossmark Global Investments chief market strategist Victoria Fernandez shares which of the big banks stocks investors consider now while Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Ines Ferré takes a closer look at the results from Morgan Stanley (MS) and Goldman Sachs (GS). To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Opening Bid.

headline: Bank execs optimistic on the economy. Everyone else is worried.
summary: As earnings releases continue to roll out from Big Banks this week, S&P Global Market Intelligence director of financial institutions research Nathan Stovall reacts to the commentary from banking executives on the economy and the state of the US consumer. Also watch Nathan Stovall comment on why bank stocks may be slipping despite generally positive earnings results. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Domination.
